@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2008 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Sebastian Werner (wpbasti) Fabian Jakobs (fjakobs) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The Composite is a generic container widget. It exposes all methods to set layouts and to manage child widgets as public methods. You must configure this widget with a layout manager to define the way the widget's children are positioned. Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 


   var composite = new qx.ui.container.Composite()

   composite.setLayout(new qx.ui.layout.HBox(5));

   composite.add(new qx.ui.basic.Label("Name: "));
   composite.add(new qx.ui.form.TextField());
   this.getRoot().add(composite);

This example horizontally groups a label and text field by using a Composite configured with a horizontal box layout as a container. External Documentation Documentation of this widget in the qooxdoo manual.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
layout {qx.ui.layout.Abstract} A layout instance to use to
   place widgets on the screen.
@param.description:
A layout instance to use to
   place widgets on the screen.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This event is fired after a child widget was added to this widget. The {@link qx.event.type.Data#getData} method of the event returns the added child.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This event is fired after a child widget has been removed from this widget. The {@link qx.event.type.Data#getData} method of the event returns the removed child.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the children list

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.ui.core.LayoutItem[]} The children array (Arrays are
   reference types, please do not modify them in-place)
@return.description:
The children array (Arrays are
   reference types, please do not modify them in-place)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the widget contains children.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Returns true when the widget has children.
@return.description: Returns true when the widget has children.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the index position of the given widget if it is a child widget. Otherwise it returns -1. This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.Widget} the widget to query for
@param.description: the widget to query for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.
@return.description: The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a new child widget. The supported keys of the layout options map depend on the layout manager used to position the widget. The options are documented in the class documentation of each layout manager {@link qx.ui.layout}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} the widget to add.
@param.description: the widget to add.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.
@param.description: Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a child widget at the specified index This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} Widget to add
@param.description: Widget to add

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index, at which the widget will be inserted
@param.description: Index, at which the widget will be inserted

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.
@param.description: Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a widget before another already inserted widget This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} Widget to add
@param.description: Widget to add

@param.name: @param
@param.body: before {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} Widget before the new widget will be inserted.
@param.description: Widget before the new widget will be inserted.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.
@param.description: Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove the given child widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} the widget to remove
@param.description: the widget to remove

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove the widget at the specified index. This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index of the widget to remove.
@param.description: Index of the widget to remove.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove all children.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Array} An array of the removed children.
@return.description: An array of the removed children.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set a layout manager for the widget. A a layout manager can only be connected with one widget. Reset the connection with a previous widget first, if you like to use it in another widget instead.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: layout {qx.ui.layout.Abstract} The new layout or null to reset the layout.
@param.description: The new layout or null to reset the layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the widget's layout manager.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string
